channel.title: [HTML] Basic RSPS template for HTML newbies
channel.description:
[center][u][size=36pt][b]Basic HTML Template[/b][/size][/u][/center]
[center]This template was designed by me to help newbie HTML designers to learn more of the HTML basics.
If you know totally nothing about HTML not even what does it mean , just don't bother downloading.[/center]
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][b]You have the rights to edit anything you want in this template.[/b][/center]
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][size=20pt][b]Screenshot[/b][/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/demo.png[/img][/center]
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][size=20pt][b][u]Downloads[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[center][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47273192/Naseem%27s%20Template.rar][b][OLD] Direct Download[/b][/url][/center]
[center][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47273192/Template%20Giveaway%20update.rar][b][NEW] Direct Download[/b][/url][/center]
[center][b]Changes:[/b][/center]
[center]- The menu bar buttons will "light up" when a mouse is above it. [/center] [center]( Sorry for bad English :X )[/center]
[center]_________________________________________________[/center]
[center][b]Thank you :T[/b][/center]
